channel.title: Buffer Pool Manager on Note
channel.description: Recent content in Buffer Pool Manager on Note

item.title: Buffer Pool Manager
item.description: This project asks us to build a buffer pool manager for DBMS. The goal for the DBMS is to manage the RAM. The page id is the globally unique id for all the pages. To the client, there is no need to change the work for ids. Why do we need a free_list? Because we do not want to return the memory buck to the OS. Does page table contain both pinned and unpinned pages?
